attributes.action: Reconsider filling the coffers of the Private sector to the detriment of the taxpayer.........
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Government has decided to farm out contracts to recover alleged debts to the CSA and DWP to 'approved' Debt Collection/Purchase Companies, and thereby benefit the Taxpayer.

By definition, HMG no longer considers it's own recovery methods suitable OR practical to recover such debts....and at this point it would be beneficial to any 'ruling' party to declare any interests in such a recovery operation.

HMG should be aware that many UK Citizens believe this to be a further erosion of our rights to privacy and that this is simply another method to get everyone on the 'Database', ID cards by the back door.

If any Private Company is making profit from the decision to sell the details of NI holders/Tax payers, then the ministers who took this decision MUST be called to account.

We call for ALL Ministers and MP's who approved this abomination to make themselves known............
